DOC.brief_summary: The primary goal study use optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) angiography ( blood vessel mapping ) : 1. diagnose presence new blood vessel wet age-related macular degeneration ( AMD ) 2. evaluate patient undergo treatment wet AMD 3. determine reduce flow choroid risk factor develop wet AMD .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( Groups wet AMD ) : Adults age 50 old clinical finding treatmentna√Øve ( never treat ) neovascular AMD active new blood vessel growth confirm clinical testing consider Inclusion Criteria ( Group healthy eye ) No evidence retinal disease Refractive error great +3.00 diopter 7.00 diopter ( glass Rx ) No recent eye surgery last 4 month No significant cataract interfere quality image Exclusion Criteria ( All Groups ) : Inability give inform consent Significant kidney disease Blood pressure great 180/110 Previous macular laser treatment Inability maintain stable fixation OCT image Visual acuity worse 20/200
